remarks: Modular pair conditions that imply the modular pair property in a sublattice.  Lemma 1.5.1 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 2.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Dec-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mdslmd.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
mdslmd.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
mdslmd.3 $e |- C e. CH $.
mdslmd.4 $e |- D e. CH $.
mdslmd3i $p |- ( ( ( A MH B /\ ( A i^i B ) MH C ) /\ ( ( A i^i C ) C_ D /\ D C_ A ) ) -> D MH ( B i^i C ) ) $.
